Detailed Description

AuthGatewaySession is the gateway session object which holds data about the current session and whose contents is saved and retrieved from the Tomcat session space.

Author:
Kenneth Sharp
Version:
3.0 (released September 15, 2005)

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.AuthGatewaySession (  HttpSession  sessionIn  ) 
 

Constructor for the AuthGatewaySession utility class. Retrieves the authentication method previously defined for the session, or the default method if none is already defined.

Parameters:
HttpSession corresponding to the user's SMBSessionID.

edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.AuthGatewaySession (  HttpSession  sessionIn,
String  methodWanted
) 
 

Constructor for the AuthGatewaySession utility class.

Parameters:
HttpSession corresponding to the user's SMBSessionID.
String is the name of the authenication method wanted. If null, the default method is retrieved.

Member Function Documentation

Cookie edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.createSessionCookie (   ) 
 

Creates a session cookie containing the Authentication SessionID, named for the keyName found in the session's authentication method. The cookie will be returned to any web application running on the cookie domain defined for the authentication method, such as .slac.stanford.edu

Returns:
Cookie containing the SMBSessionID

String edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.getAuthClass (   ) 
 

Returns the authentication class used for this session.

Returns:
String containing the authentication class.

Returns the authentication method used for this session.

String edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.getBody1Include (   ) 
 

Returns the pathname of the first body HTML file. This is an html file should be included at the top of the <BODY> of the login page.

Returns:
String containing the path name.

String edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.getBody2Include (   ) 
 

Returns the pathname of the second body HTML file. This is an html file that should be included at the end of the <BODY> of the login page.

Returns:
String containing the path name.

String edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.getCookieDomain (   ) 
 

Returns the most domain for the SessionID cookie. (ex. .slac.stanford.edu)

Returns:
String containing the cookie domain.

String edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.getHeaderInclude (   )

Hashtable edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.getProperties (   ) 
 

Returns the user properties found in the database. This may include things like: which beamlines the user may access, phone number, etc.

Returns:
Hashtable containing the properties.

void edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.resetSessionData (   ) 
 

Resets all the data members in the object to the empty state.

void edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.saveSessionData (   ) 
 

Saves data in the AuthGatewaySession object to the session data maintained by the Tomcat Servlet engine. This is how session data persists from one web page to another.

void edu.stanford.slac.ssrl.authentication.utility.AuthGatewaySession.setErrorMsg (  String  err  )
